## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G41670](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G41670)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SIN2, SIN2</u>
- **Gene Name:** SHORT INTEGUMENT 2
- **Description:**   P-loop containing nucleoside triphosphate hydrolases superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2062657
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS3945]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Short or absent integuments on ovules, growth of both integuments arrest shortly after initiation; subtle pleiotropic effects observed in the gynoecia (pistils) and sepals of flowers: most pistils have a cleft stigma in the axis of one of the valves, valve on the cleft side of the stigma commonly bears an outgrowth (bump), sepal margins are jagged, consisting of few small rounded cells, especially toward the tips; complete female sterility; slightly slow growth rate.
   - [CS68694]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Female-sterile, aberrant ovules, short integuments, cleft stigma.
